Package org.zanata.rest.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountResource
    Represents user accounts in the system.
    AsynchronousProcessResource
    Represents a resource for an asynchronous (i.e.
    CopyTransResource
    Represents the state of a copy trans run.
    FileResource
    Represents various types of translatable files to be processed by the server instead of the REST client.
    GlossaryResource
    Glossary management
    LocalesResource  
    ProjectIterationLocalesResource
    REST interface for configured version locales.
    ProjectIterationResource Deprecated
    ProjectLocalesResource
    REST interface for configured project locales.
    ProjectResource
    Manage projects
    projectSlug: Project Identifier.
    ProjectsResource
    API endpoint to get a list of projects.
    ProjectVersionResource
    Project version resource API, replacing ProjectIterationResource.
    RestConstants  
    RestResource Deprecated
    REST Resource implementations are discovered by the presence of @Path only (not inherited), as per spec.
    SourceDocResource
    Source document API.
    StatisticsResource
    Fetch different translation statistics
    TranslatedDocResource
    Translated document API.
    TranslationMemoryResource
    Allows clients to [push and] pull translation memories.
    VersionResource
    Retrieves the system's version.
